summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Thirty-fourth Avenue from East Pike Street to East Denny Way, et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks under Ordinance No. 17448, creating Local Improvement District No. 1646 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
